item.description:
More details to come, but right now we're planning:

  • Themed card swap
  • Monthly challenge show-and-tell
  • Some kind of how-to demonstration--again, details will come.
    ...and more!

    Again, we'll go from until 5--I'm suggesting a half-hour later start (10:30) to give the store owner and your organizer(s) time to set things up.

    As always, please RSVP soon even if your answer is "no" or "maybe"--this helps greatly with planning. And remember, you can always update your RSVP as your plans change. Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a blonde with a long black apron. But you can "check in" yourself at the table near the door. Just sign in, pick up a name tag and drop off payment (and drop off your swap, cards, if applicable). Then sit down anywhere and make stuff!
item.why: This is a talented, lively and friendly group. You'll learn a lot, make stuff and have fun.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: February Meetup in Wellesley
